channel.title: Leaflet on Be ambitious
channel.description: Recent content in Leaflet on Be ambitious

item.title: rMaps: 超級酷的地圖
item.description: 今日仰視slidify作者Ramnath Vaidyanathan的github頁面發現超酷的rMaps包，抄過來在自己電腦上實驗一下。 下載 require(devtools) install_github('ramnathv/rCharts@dev') install_github('ramnathv/rMaps') 繪制美國2010年的各州的犯罪率 Crime Rates (per 100,000) by State at 2010 利用以下的R編碼在Rstudio裏實現上圖效果 library(rMaps) map <- ichoropleth(Crime ~ State, data = subset(violent_crime, Year == 2010)) map map$publish("Crime Rates (per 100, 000) by State across Years") # <- 引號中的將會是生成的動態地圖的網頁名稱 ## Loading required package: httr ## Please enter your github username: ***** # <- 在此處輸入你自己的github用戶名 ## Please enter your github password: ***** # <- 在此輸入你自己的github用戶密碼 ## Your gist has been published ## View chart at http://rcharts.
